programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the third round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Sale v Newcastle, Northampton v Leicester, Bath v Gloucester and Harlequins v Saracens.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Sharply funny drama. Toms family meeting goes awry when shocking secrets are revealed, and Shiv has an important interview to focus on but cant seem to escape Jack.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Sharply funny drama. Shiv sees a new side to Alex and learns about his family, Bernies interview is published with disastrous results, and Ant makes a suspicious discovery.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: James Martins Midweek Menu
programme.desc: James Martin serves up some of his favourite recipes from his Saturday Morning series, including a dish of pork with a cider and apple sauce and a lunch he made for Mick Hucknall.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Ricky Hattons son Campbell reveals how his family are honouring the late boxers memory. Plus, England Rugby star Chris Robshaw and his Strictly partner Nadiya Bychkova.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: From Blackadder to The Brits - comedy legend Ben Elton lifts the lid on 45 years in the spotlight in his brand-new autobiography.

programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.desc: Join the Loose Women team as they interview celebrity guests and discuss topical issues.

programme.desc: David Dickinson is in Preston with dealers Alison Chapman, Tim Hogarth, Jan Keyne and Henry Nicholls.

programme.title: Tenable
programme.desc: A team of five amateur dramatic enthusiasts get their chance to win a bumper cash prize by answering Top 10 list questions.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Liz from Cheshire, Patrick from Manchester, David from Cheltenham and Amy from Halifax - come together to take on a Chaser.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Dylan and April are pushed into dangerous situations, a suggestion by Joe brings more conflict, and Robert lies to Aaron.

programme.title: Scotland Tonight: A Conversation with Susie McCabe
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: This episode follows the cases of Mark Thorpe - who yearns to find an older brother - and Jane Lewis, who was taken into foster care at 11 days old and seeks her three brothers.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.desc: Food prices are on the rise again - Kate Quilton finds out what is driving the price hikes and if we can bring down the cost of our weekly shop.
